pr_title: [GEOS-9135] Support WFS-T on tables with unique guid as primary key

timeline.message:
[GEOS-9135] Support WFS-T on tables with unique guid as primary key

Add unit test for generated UUID

replies.bodyText: @jodygarnett this file has had the wrong header since before we switched to git, I don't think it's @petersmythe job to fix it. The QA checks only validate sources in src/main, skipping the ones in src/test. Try to enable it for test sources and you'll find out why (the hard way). If you feel it's important to fix it, do as I did, take your spare time and go over all the sources, make a pull request that enables the checks on tests and fixes all the missing/incorrect headers.
replies.author: aaime

replies.bodyText: fair enough, I just noticed because the file was modified.
replies.author: jodygarnett
